🆕 Latest Updates (v1.4):
Added ability to rename tag groups
Added functionality to close groups
Implemented greyed-out styling for discarded tabs
Fixed several translation-related bugs
🔍 Quick Search
 Instantly filter tabs by title or URL
 Real-time search results
 Smart matching algorithm
📊 Advanced Sorting
 Sort tabs by last accessed time
 Sort by title alphabetically
 Sort by website domain
 Ascending/descending options
👥 Group Management
 View tabs by their groups
 Quick navigation between groups
 Drag-and-drop group organization
 Ungrouped tabs section
 Time-based auto grouping
 Website-based grouping
⚡ Enhanced Navigation
 Single-click tab switching
 Smooth animations
 Clean and intuitive interface
 Tab history tracking
 Pin frequently used tabs
🎨 Visual Improvements
 Favicon support for each tab
 Adaptive text colors for better readability
 Clean, modern interface design
Perfect for:
 Power users with many open tabs
 Developers working across multiple projects
 Researchers managing multiple resources
 Anyone who wants better tab organization
This extension helps you stay organized and productive by providing a clean, efficient way to manage your Chrome tabs.
